EVENTS

There are two ways to submit events to this site, read on below. You can find out more about submitting materials on our submit page.

  • YOUR EVENT HERE: PLACE, DATE/TIME, LINK
  • [PAST] NICAR: JS for Journalists: Atlanta, GA, 03/06/15 at 3:20 p.m. - 4:20 p.m., Mapping JS

LIST YOUR EVENT

To add your event to the list above, just fork this repo and add your event in markdown (reverse chronological order) to the list above, and then submit a pull request. You can read more about how to do this on our CONTRIBUTING.md page.

CONTRIBUTE YOUR EVENT

If youâ€™d rather not edit markdown or fork this repo, you can also submit your event via this form, and send a quick email to aurelia@cartodb.com to reminder her to add your event ASAP. Thanks!
